programme.title: Surprise Artie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E19, Doug tries to keep Arthur busy while Carrie sets up a surprise party for his 75th birthday.

programme.title: Wild Cards
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E20, Doug loses all his money when he goes to Atlantic City with Deacon; Arthur threatens to injure Carrie's boss.

programme.title: Big Dougie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E21, Big Brother Doug tries anything to impress his new protege, including entering a 10K run.

programme.title: Soft Touch
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E22, Doug is duped by Tim into participating in a pyramid scheme that requires him to sell water filters.

programme.title: Restaurant Row
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E23, Carrie bars Doug from eating at his favorite Italian restaurant, but he goes back for lunch and bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E24, Carrie gets jealous of a co-worker who received flowers and accuses Doug of losing his sense of romance.

programme.title: Whine Country
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E25, A coin toss decides the destination for Doug and Carrie's vacation; Arthur and Spence join Doug and Carrie on vacation.

programme.title: Do Rico
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E01, When Doug does the voice of a new co-worker, he feels that Carrie will only listen to him if he does the voice.

programme.title: Roast Chicken
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E02, When Doug's boss sees what a comedian he is, he asks him to "roast" him at his banquet. However, Doug finds that he is not as funny as he first thought.

programme.title: Fatty McButterpants
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E03, When Doug learns that Carrie is buying him clothing from the "Big and Tall Shop", he is determined to lose weight.

programme.title: Class Struggle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E04, When Carrie spends a night out with some of her colleagues, she finds out that they are more successful then she is.

programme.title: Strike One
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E05, While Doug's company is in strict negotiations, he decides to buy a brand new SUV.

programme.title: Strike Too
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E06, It is week two of the IPS strike, and Doug still has not gotten a job. To get back on his feet, his sister Stephanie get him a substitute teacher job at her school.

programme.title: Strike Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E07, Carrie and Kelly plan a get-together for Doug, Deacon and Arthur to keep them from going crazy during the strike.

programme.title: Dark Meet
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E08, Doug, Carrie and Arthur are thinking about the first Thanksgiving they (and Arthur's second wife Lily) spent together.

programme.title: Twisted Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E09, Doug and Carrie have to watch Deacon and Kelly's kids while they are out of town. When one of the kids sees them having sex, they have to find a way to keep him from saying anything.

programme.title: Work Related
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E10, When Arthur goes to Carrie's work he is offered a job there, which really begins to irritate her. Doug competes to be Mr. May for IPS but Deacon is in the way of him getting it.

programme.title: Better Camera
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E11, Doug buys Carrie a camera for christmas, but her office gives her a better one. Lou Ferigno moves in next door.

programme.title: Wedding Presence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E12, Doug and Carrie try to go to a wedding but not have to stay.

programme.title: Hi-Def Jam
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E13, Doug convinces his sister to go out with Carrie's boss so that he can go to his house to watch the Super Bowl on his high-def TV.

programme.title: Paint Misbehavin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E14, Doug makes Carrie tell him people she knows that she finds attractive, and she says Deacon. Deacon is having a birthday party at a paintball course and it turns into a war.

programme.title: Deacon Blues
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E15, Doug sees Deacon with another woman while he told Kelly he had to work late.

programme.title: Horizontal Hold
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E16, Carrie bans sex for two weeks because she's afraid she and Doug don't talk enough.

programme.title: Inner Tube
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E17, Doug lies to Carrie about having to work late so he can play mud football and get out of going to her seminar.

programme.title: Papa Pill
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E18, Doug feels sorry for Arthur and lets him go to a bar instead of a dance at his senior center. When Carrie finds out she gives Doug full control of Arthur, and Doug realizes how hard it is to deal with him.

programme.title: Package Deal
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E19, Doug receives an offer from FedEx and tells his IPS boss that if he wont give Doug a better route than he will transfer to FedEx.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E20, During Deacon and Kelly's separation, Doug and Carrie go out with Kelly and run into a guy, Bill, Carrie knows from work.

programme.title: Departure Time
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E21, Doug's parents are coming in town so Doug and Carrie decide to go and pick them up at the airport and they bring upsetting news to Doug.

programme.title: Swim Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E22, After a big storm Doug and Carrie catch their annoying neighbors in their backyard cleaning up. Then they give the idea to Doug and Carrie that they should tear down the wall dividing them and make it on big backyard.

programme.title: S'no Job
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E23, Danny's father Stu asks Doug to arrange a job interview for Danny at IPS. Doug however doesn't want Danny to work with him.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (1)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E24, Carrie discovers that she's pregnant, and she's panicked that the timing is wrong. Meanwhile, Deacon and Kelly begin to reconcile.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (2)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E25, Doug tells Carrie not to panic about having the baby, that he will take care of all her "burden," so he takes on a second job so that they can store a little extra money before the due date.

programme.title: Walk, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E01, In an effort to spend more time with Carrie, Doug hires someone (Nicole Sullivan) to take Arthur for a walk three times a week.

programme.title: Sight Gag
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E02, Doug uses a two-for-one coupon to give Carrie a gift of corneal surgery which results in her temporary blindness.

programme.title: Mean Streak
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E03, Doug prepares to break the record for the most consecutive deliveries without incident; Arthur asks Holly to play in Scrabble tournament.

programme.title: Friender Bender
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E04, Doug and Carrie's friendship with Deacon and Kelly is tested after Doug is distracted and backs into their car.

programme.title: No Retreat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E05, Arthur is left to fend for himself when Doug and Carrie go on her company retreat with a group of boring lawyers.

programme.title: Ticker Treat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E06, Doug's Halloween decorations put Arthur in the hospital; Deacon doesn't like Kirby's choice of a Halloween costume.

programme.title: Crash Of The Titans
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E20, Sam and Rebecca try to buy the bar's poolroom and restrooms from John Allen Hill. In the end, Rebecca pays for the majority of the cost, in exchange for part ownership of Cheers.

programme.title: It's A Wonderful Wife
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E21, Norm's wife takes a job at the restaurant above Cheers.

programme.title: Cheers Has Chili
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E22, Woody increases traffic at Cheers by selling his famous chili.

programme.title: Carla Loves Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E23, Cliff poses as a judge in the Miss Barmaid contest to win Carla's favor.

programme.title: Pitch It Again, Sam
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E24, Sam plans to strike out an old baseball rival at a charity game.

programme.title: Rat Girl

programme.title: Home Malone
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E26, Sam locks himself out of the house while babysitting for Lilith and Frasier's son.

programme.title: Uncle Sam Wants You
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E27, Sam embarks on a search for a suitable mother to have his baby.

programme.title: Baby Balk
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E01, Sam and Rebecca seek psychiatric help for getting in the mood.

programme.title: Get Your Kicks On Route 666
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E02, The guys of Cheers get stranded when they take a road trip on Route 66.

programme.title: Madame LaCarla
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E03, Carla's psychic asks her to take over her spiritual reading business.

programme.title: The Norm Who Came To Dinner
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E04, Norm stays at Lilith and Fraiser's house while recovering from an injury.

programme.title: Ma's Little Maggie
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E05, Cliff's mom wants him to get married when she meets his girlfriend.

programme.title: Unplanned Parenthood
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E06, Woody hires an actress to pose as Kelly in a home video to his parents.

programme.title: Bar Wars V: The Final Judgement
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E07, Sam's convinced that the death of his rival is jus a silly one of his pranks.

programme.title: Where Have All The Floorboards Gone?
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E08, Cliff's brainteaser could prove to be undoing of Kevin McHale.

programme.title: Head Over Hill
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E09, Cliff's taken for a wild horse ride when he participates in a commemoration.

programme.title: A Fine French Whine
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E10, Woody's girl agrees to marry Frenchman Henri to keep him from getting deported.

programme.title: I'm Ok, You're Defective
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E11, Rebecca blames Sam for their lack of offspring when she passes her fertility test.

programme.title: Go Make
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E12, Sam and Rebecca question whether or not they really love each other.

programme.title: Don't Shoot I'm Only The Psychiatrist
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E13, Frasier takes his "low self-esteem group" to Cheers for interactive therapy.

programme.title: No Rest For The Woody
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E14, Woody takes a second job at a graveyard to pay for Kelly's engagement ring.

programme.title: My Son, The Father
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E15, Carla acts like a holy terror when her son decides to join the priesthood.

programme.title: One Hugs, The Other Doesn't
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E16, Frasier has a run-in with his first wife while at a children's concert with his family.

programme.title: A Diminished Rebecca With A Suspended Cliff
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E17, Woody's cousin develops a crush on Rebecca and Cliff is very unhappy with the new postal uniforms.

programme.title: License To Hill
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E18, While Woody takes the gang to the cleaner on poker night, Cheers gets busted.

programme.title: Rich Man, Wood Man
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E19, Woody returns from England with a new wardrobe and elitist attitude.

programme.title: Smotherly Love
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E20, Lilith's domineering mother comes to town with a strange request.

programme.title: Take Me Out Of The Ball Game
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E21, Sam returns to the major league to prove that he still "got it."

programme.title: Bar Wars VI: This Time It's For Real
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E22, Sam puts his life on the line when he pulls pranks on a competing bar owner.

programme.title: Rebecca's Lover...Not
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E23, Rebecca attempts to rekindle passion with her old high school flame.

programme.title: Heeeeeere's Cliffy!
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E24, Norm bribes the "Tonight Show" to use one of Cliff's jokes on the air.

programme.title: An Old-Fashioned Wedding (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E25, Woody and Kelly's wedding day has arrived, but trouble appears to be brewing.

programme.title: An Old-Fashioned Wedding (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S10E26, Despite Carla's predictions of disaster, Woody and Kelly's wedding goes on.

programme.title: The Little Match Girl
programme.desc: Cheers, S11E01, Sam might lose Cheers for good when Rebecca burns down most of the bar.

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

Moon Shots: Inside the Lost Apollo Archive, 20160101080000 +0000, The world famous Apollo missions are some of the greatest feats ever accomplished by man. With rare archive footage and unprecedented access to life on board the Apollo spacecrafts, this stunning one-hour special brings scientific history to life.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: The Planet Makers
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Planet Makers, S01E05, From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets.

programme.title: OCEANS IN THE SKY
programme.desc: The New Frontier: OCEANS IN THE SKY, S05E07, Juice and the Europa Clipper are two missions to our Solar System’s largest planet.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Top 10 Moments of 2021
programme.desc: Court Cam, 20240712042900 +0000, A countdown of the "Top 10 Moments" of 2021 on "Court Cam."

programme.title: Torched/Girl Fight
programme.desc: After the First 48, S03E05, In Miami, Detective Freddie Ponce arrests a man who tortured and killed his childhood friend. The case is strong--until an unexpected event in the first days of trial puts the whole thing in jeopardy.

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: After the First 48, S04E01, After a 17-year-old girl is found with a bullet through the back of her head in the woods of Katy, Texas, a young man comes forward who claims to be an eyewitness. Investigators are shocked by the unusual deal he's made with the DA.

programme.title: Snipers in the Capital
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E25, When a deadly sniper terrorizes the DC area for weeks, frantic police put out an APB for a white van.

programme.title: The Green River Killer
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E30, Over 20 years four-dozen women are murdered in Washington state and five of the victims are found in the Green River.

programme.title: The Sadist of San Luis Obispo
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E35, A predator on early release from prison turns the quiet town of San Luis Obispo into a hunting ground, preying on young, unsuspecting, college age women.

programme.title: Stanko
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E40, Out on parole, an ex-con turned published author goes on a 24-hour killing spree.

programme.title: Psychic Sleuth

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.
MST3K: Catalina Caper, 19901013000000 +0000, Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, scuba diving, and beach 'bunnies', while another boy's con-artist parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hamlet, S10E09, A dour production of Shakespeare’s play produced for German TV. A prince returns home for his father’s funeral and doesn’t like what he finds.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.
MST3K: Demon Squad, 20220624000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

MST3K: Stranded In Space, 19910629000000 +0000, The gang on the SoL have a gag-weapon war with the Mads and watch an unsuccessful TV pilot about an astronaut stuck on an Earth-like planet where ;perfect order; rules.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).
MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come, 20220930000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: Heart and Soul
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Jack remain worlds apart and Abigail finds the truth about Bill.

programme.title: Heart's Desire
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail travels to Hamilton to stay with Elizabeth's family.

Kitten Bowl, 20140202000000 +0000, The greatest feline showdown in cable television history! The competition will consist of two preliminary playoffs and a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern and John Sterling.
Kitten Bowl II, 20150201000000 +0000, A feline competition featuring two preliminary rounds followed by a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Kitten Bowl III, 20160207000000 +0000, Hallmark Channel presents the nation's most athletic, adorable and adoptable kittens in a claws-out, paws-out showdown for Kitten Bowl III. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

programme.title: A Birthday Wish
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E05, Hallmark Original Series. When a visiting chef is unable to relax, Cassie arranges for a day at the stove.

programme.title: Covenant
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E08, Alec Colson is claiming he has shocking proof that the government is covering up a liaison with aliens, and that Earth was almost destroyed by an alien invasion, Colson gives all nations involved 24 hours to come clean or he'll do it for them.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E05, After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Childhood's End
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E06, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E09, Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E11, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse as he attempts to regain control of Atlantis from the Genii, who have taken the city along with Weir (Torri Higginson) and McKay (David Hewlett) hostage.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Sacrifices
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E09, Teal'c and Bra'tac have just returned from the planet Ha'ktyl, where they tried to convince the warrior-woman rebel leader Ishta, to wait until her fellow insurgent Jaffa grow numerous enough to wage war against all the Goa'uld system lords at once.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E10, The Stargate is missing. Upon investigation the team notice a scientist tagging the stargate with a locator beacon. It looks like this is the work of The Trust taking whatever ruthless action they deem necessary to protect Earth from alien invaders.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E11, An old IDC comes through; Send M.A.L.P. The M.A.L.P. telemetry shows that the person sending the transmission is Carter but Carter is in the control room at SGC. The Carter on the other side explains that she is a Replicator.

programme.title: Prometheus Unbound
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E12, A mission has been greenlit to take the Prometheus to the Pegasus galaxy. Jackson wants in. O'Neill feels he is too valuable to risk. The decision is overridden by the mission commander, none other than Gen. Hammond, now head of home world security.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Coming Out, Getting Out, Going Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E24, Valerie puts the club up as collateral to bail Colin out of jail. Kelly comes home from rehab and Donna is put off by the frequent phone calls from a lonely Tara. Clare, Susan, Brandon and Steve organize a romantic evening for the Nat and Joan.

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E25, Rush dumps Ryan and Austin off on Steve on the same day that he is hosting a fraternity party. Kelly invites Tara to stay with her after she finishes her stint in rehab.

programme.title: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E26, Brandon, Steve, and Joe go on a camping trip with Susan, Clare, and Donna. The girls become jealous when the guys repeatedly ignore them to help some damsels in distress. Tara sabotages Kelly's relationship with Greg.

programme.title: Ticket To Ride
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E29, Colin tries to remain strong as he prepares to turn himself in and begin his prison term. Brandon and Susan lose a five-thousand-dollar lottery ticket, leading to a major argument.

programme.title: Ray Of Hope
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E30, Kelly agrees to help with the search for Colin when Brandon reveals that Nat could fall victim to the bail bondsman through his business ties to Valerie. Donna balks when she and David are asked to produce a music video for Ray.

programme.title: Remember The Alamo
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E01, Brandon and Steve run into a bit of trouble when their car breaks down. Donna works with David on a video shoot, and the singer isn't the only one that is hard to deal with.

programme.title: A Mate For Life

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing and possible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E12, Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E19, When severe cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy, Matt and Summer volunteer to guard as civilians. But can they convince the county commissioners to increase the budget before lifeguards are laid off?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E20, Stephanie Holden spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E21, Matt doesn't know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her frantic father. Meanwhile, Stephanie must choose between Mitch and Scott.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E22, A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a rescue on the Baywatch beach and realizes that a television series based on lifeguarding is perfect, sending Baywatch headquarters into a tizzy.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E01, After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch to place an underwater seismometer in the Malibu fault. Hobie has an argument with his father about his future.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E02, Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake! Hobie's and Jackie's lives hang in the balance. It is up to the Baywatch team to save them before it's too late!
